channel.title: Devs Needed (Paying) (Version 667)
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
I am using a source called "PowerSurge" and i am looking for a few coders/developers.
You may ask... Well why are you paying when most good coders will do it for free? The answer being.. i am not just looking for a one time coder, i am looking for someone that can keep coding and at-least put out one fix/new item/new gui/new anything in the game once a week.
You may also ask... Well what is the pay? The pay is a percent of the donations that come in,So.... the better you code/add new things the more people will donate and the more money you get, And your percent will go up if you keep releasing fixs/new stuff.
You may also ask... If i helped you what are the main things you want coded? I would like a few things coded, they are stated below.
[s]#1 There are 100 error's in the current client i am using "667 client, Download link and virus scan will be below this"
Client download: [url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/mihf4ww83oogv58/667%20Client.zip?dl=1]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/mihf4ww83oogv58/667%20Client.zip?dl=1[/url] Client VirusScan: [url=https://www.virustotal.com/file/6e7d13f1d8cf85db7711cb0a3eacc6adae2bbddef09219567a221f72795d6a5b/analysis/1357620543/]https://www.virustotal.com/file/6e7d13f1d8cf85db7711cb0a3eacc6adae2bbddef09219567a221f72795d6a5b/analysis/1357620543/[/url][/s] [b]Fixed Myself[/b]
#2 [s]I will need someone to edit the "Upgraded" item bonuses to make them better then normal items. "upgraded items are just lucky items with a new name"[/s] [b]Fixed myself[/b]
#3[s] I will need a web developer, that knows more then just making a forum or ripping another website.[/s] [b]Fixed Myself[/b]
#4 I will need the clan war,multi pk,safe zone areas fixed "currently no one can pvp in them, i think its because the wilderness wall"
#5 I will need someone that can re-arrange the home/spawn point and make it look better.
More will be needed in the future.
If you're up to coding please reply to this thread or add my skype "rewardelite"

item.title: Devs Needed (Paying) (Version 667)
item.dc:creator: @bubbaduddles bubbaduddles
item.description:
@bubbaduddles wrote:

[quote=“T h 3, post:7, topic:477886”][quote author=bubbaduddles link=topic=596084.msg4197048#msg4197048 date=1357656707]

T h 3 i am sorry but as stated i am looking for a full website not just a forum or a ripp from another website
[/quote]

I’m not sure what your talking about, the reason for wordpress is to make it a full unique handmade website…

IMO you shouldn’t even attempt to pay for programmers from your donations. This isnt going to be any money at all, and your best programmers that will last the longest will be the ones who do it for free, because they share your ideas and enjoy your leadership.

Edit: I thought I saw a bit of commitment thats why I applied. btw heres the top thread on Web development.

I’m using the term industry very openly.
As few of you may know, I work on a website for a guy that really doesn’t know much about websites, he also seems to pay handsomely for it.
But I don’t want to be charging too low (ripping myself off) and I don’t want to charge to high (ripping him off).
So, I’d like to know, what do you guys typically charge for web services and such. I listed a few things I’m doing for him currently below.

[ul][li]Writing HTML/CSS (normal)[/li]
[li]Re-Writing the entire website (30+ pages HTML, and some other pages I have yet to see)[/li]
[li]Working on a Wordpress site (Honestly, I have no clue how to do this, help would be lovely)[/li]
[li]And more[/li][/ul]

What is a good rate/fee I could charge?

^ hes writing alot himself , but needs help on using WordPress because you HAVE to make things from the files even with shit themes.[/quote]

i understand but… if i just needed the wordpress then why wont i just use the RSC forums and website witch i have uploaded to “bubba-craft.com” its a forums that comes with more but… its a RIPP and thats not what i am looking for,

to break it down and not to flame you or try to seem mean but i am not looking for a wordpress because alot of the other servers have wordpress’s and i would like this server to be different from the others so it brings people in.

Read full topic

What is a good rate/fee I could charge?[/quote]

item.title: Devs Needed (Paying) (Version 667)
item.dc:creator: @bubbaduddles bubbaduddles
item.description:
@bubbaduddles wrote:

zeropointx:

I would understand if you paid for coding for example 30$/fixes but since you give % of donations I wonder why do you get most of them? Isn’t coding the hard work of making rsps?

the reason i am offerering a percent of the donation is, you will keep getting money from it, not just a one time payment

T h 3 i am sorry but as stated i am looking for a full website not just a forum or a ripp from another website

Read full topic

item.title: Devs Needed (Paying) (Version 667)
item.dc:creator: @T_h_3 T h 3
item.description:
@T_h_3 wrote:

I’ve been wanting to make an exceptional website for a server that plans to last. The site would be based off of Wordpress with a SMF forum, the wordpress is just to create a full site feel and open the door for some amazing graphic work. The core of the site itself will create users on the smf database and can be easily integrated with the server to add extras like Highscores, Vote system, Professional looking Donation shops etc…

I have the full (paid) version of Adobe Photoshop CS6. (And know how to use it well.)
I’m willing to host the website and the webclient for the server to help keep speeds to a maximum for the server.
I’ve been working with RSPS’s for 8-10 months mainly focused on PI but can adapt quickly.
I’m willing to spend 4 hours a day 4-5 days a week ADVERTISING/WORKING ON THE SITE.

Contact me on Skype if interested : Ahndeey

Read full topic
